content: Hello Mister Heine, my name is Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia. Thanks for inviting me to see the apartment in New York. Let's talk about the rental price.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Hello Ryanah, thank you for showing interest in my apartment. Based on the current market rates, I would like to propose a rental price of 2000 Euros per month. This price takes into consideration the size and location of the apartment, as well as the current demand in the area. Is this a price that you are comfortable with?
name: Heinrich Heine

content: I am comfortable with that price. I agree to the price of 2000 Euros. Thank you for your understanding. I will be signing the lease soon.
name: Ryanah Rahman from Saudi-Arabia

content: Great, I'm glad to hear that you are comfortable with the proposed rental price. Please feel free to let me know if you have any questions or concerns during the signing process. I look forward to having you as my tenant.
name: Heinrich Heine

content:

content:
Hello Ryanah, thank you for your interest in the apartment. While I understand that you may want to negotiate the rental price, I am afraid that I am not able to accept any lower offers at this time. The price of 2000 Euros per month is based on the current market rates and the condition of the apartment, and it is the highest price that I am willing to consider.

I hope this information helps. If you have any other questions or concerns, please feel free to let me know.
